title: R.O.T.O.R. 1987 1080p Rifftrax 2ch (aka ROTOR)
description:
R.O.T.O.R.1987.1080p.Rifftrax.2ch.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS Rifftrax
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 2.0
TWO SUBTITLES: ENGLISH, ENGLISH SDH

R.O.T.O.R. (1987)
video: 1920x1080 AVC 2300Kbps 2-pass
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0
audio2: just movie AAC 2.0
built in subs, off by default, not hard coded: eng, eng sdh
Riffers: Bill Corbett, Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson
1h30m17s 1,798,036,703bytes
2016.02.23 Shout Factory Blu-Ray Release
2014.10.03 Rifftrax Video-On-Demand release
1988.07.28 Movie USA Videotape Release
  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0098156/  

This is a dual-audio remux including two audio tracks: the Rifftrax audio commentary and the original movie only audio track. The Rifftrax for R.O.T.O.R. is 1h27m56s long while the Blu-Ray is 1h30m17s. For this remaster, the movie only audio track was used for the sections not included in the original Rifftrax release. While every effort was made to match the volumes and make the transitions smooth, the Blu-Ray audio track is much, much cleaner than the Rifftrax so the transitions may be noticeable. Here is a list of the Blu-Ray audio with no riffs:
0.06.53-0.07.13
0.07.42-0.07.55
0.12.04-0.12.58
0.15.09-0.16.07
0.20.06-0.20.47
0.32.55-0.33.34
0.39.05-0.39.25

In addition to fitting the Rifftrax to the longer Blu-Ray, the Rifftrax audio track was compressed slightly to reduce the riff commentary a few dbs. While a complete volume re-balance is not possible since there isn't a pure commentary track to process with a pure movie track, this compression helped bring the riffs a little closer in volume to the movie sound.

The video source was a Blu-Ray rip encoded to AVC 8893Kbps. This video was re-encoded to AVC 2300Kbps 2-pass (turbo first pass) with almost identical quality. This encode is much better looking than some DVD encodes and vastly superior to the very poor video included with the Rifftrax release.

Both English and English SDH subs are included. Plus, custom named chapters are included with this share:
Ch01 Robotic Officer Tactical Operation Research
Ch02 Tactical Operations Lab   
Ch03 Cold Iron Is Fired
Ch04 ROTOR Is Born
Ch05 He's A Crazy Cop
Ch06 Justice Rampage
Ch07 To Judge And Execute
Ch08 End Credits

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/2.0 encode of the movie and the subs. A very special thanks to a community member who did a remaster of the Rifftrax audio and the widescreen DVD video. This audio track was extremely helpful in creating the newly remastered Rifftrax 2.0 track for this share. Thank you!
